content: I'm trying to declutter my apartment and sell some collectibles that no longer bring me joy. I was thinking of listing my vintage Barbie dolls on eBay, do you have any tips on how to take good photos and write a description that will attract buyers? By the way, I recently acquired a vintage 1960s-era Barbie doll at a garage sale for $20, and I think it was a steal considering its condition and rarity.
